definitions.definition: A town in the borough of Croydon , Greater London , England ( OS grid ref TQ3161 ) .
Synonym of Purley on Thames , Berkshire , England ; Purley was used on some maps.
An unincorporated community in Caswell County , North Carolina , United States .
An unincorporated community in Franklin County , Texas , United States .
